item.title: Baby John Box Office Day 4: Varun Dhawan's Film Earns ₹23.90 Crore, Faces Heat From Pushpa 2 - News18
item.description:
Baby John Box Office Day 4: Varun Dhawan's Film Earns ₹23.90 Crore

Date: December 29, 2024 Source: News18

Varun Dhawan’s film Baby John shows a modest box office recovery, collecting ₹4.25 crore on its fourth day, bringing total earnings to ₹23.90 crore despite tough competition from Pushpa 2.

  • Day 4 collection reaches ₹4.25 crore.
  • Total domestic earnings stand at ₹23.90 crore.
  • The film debuted with ₹11.25 crore but faced a steep decline.
  • Saturday’s recovery is the first positive sign after significant drops in previous days.
  • Pushpa 2 continues to dominate with ₹12.5 crore on the same day.
“The plot feels stretched, with a sluggish first half that echoes Akshay Kumar’s Rowdy Rathore.”

Despite ups and downs, Baby John remains in a competitive box office fight, and its future performance will be closely watched amidst ongoing releases.

item.title: World's most expensive reality show cost $100 million, more than Game of Thrones, Squid Game; winner gets private island - Hindustan Times
item.description:
World's Most Expensive Reality Show: Beast Games

Publication Date: Dec 29, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

The most expensive reality show in history, 'Beast Games,' has a budget of $100 million and offers contestants a grand prize of over $5 million and a private island.

  • Mr Beast invested $100 million in producing 'Beast Games.'
  • The show involves over a thousand contestants competing in various challenges.
  • 'Beast Games' surpassed other major productions like 'Game of Thrones' ($50 million) and 'Squid Game' ($22 million).
  • It holds the record for the highest prize money in a TV game show, exceeding $5 million.
  • Recognized by the Guinness Book of World Records, it has broken 50 different records.
  • The show premiered on Amazon Prime Video on December 19, 2024.
"In a promo for the show, the creator revealed some of the other records the show had broken and emphasized that the Guinness Book of World Records recognized a total of 50 records that the show had broken."

This groundbreaking production marks a new height for reality television, blending high stakes with entertainment without the deadly consequences portrayed in fictional shows.

item.title: Malayalam film and TV actor Dileep Shankar found dead in hotel room; actor Seema G Nair pays tribute - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Malayalam Actor Dileep Shankar Found Dead in Hotel Room

Date: Dec 29, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Dileep Shankar, a prominent Malayalam film and TV actor, was found dead in a hotel room in Thiruvananthapuram. He had been shooting for a TV show and was reportedly not seen for two days prior to his death.

  • Dileep checked into the hotel four days ago while shooting for the show 'Panchagni'.
  • Hotel staff discovered him unresponsive after noticing a foul smell.
  • The police are investigating, but no foul play is suspected at this time.
  • Director Manoj mentioned that Dileep had health issues and missed calls from cast members.
  • Actor Seema G Nair expressed her grief on social media, reflecting on their last conversation.
“What happened to you Dileep…why did this happen, God, I don’t even know what to write…my tributes to you.” - Seema G Nair

The incident has left the Malayalam entertainment community in shock as they remember Dileep's contributions to film and television.

The film Pushpa 2: The Rule has achieved a significant box office milestone, crossing the Rs. 750 crores mark in just 24 days, showcasing its quick success.

An All Time Mega Blockbuster.

item.title: Malayalam actor Dileep Shankar found dead in hotel room - Mathrubhumi English
item.description:
Malayalam Actor Dileep Shankar Found Dead in Hotel Room

Date: 29 December 2024 | Source: Mathrubhumi

Malayalam cine-serial actor Dileep Shankar was found dead in a hotel room in Thiruvananthapuram on Sunday morning. He had checked into the room two days ago and reportedly had not left during his stay.

  • Dileep Shankar was found lying on the floor of his hotel room by the staff after a foul smell was reported.
  • The actor had starred in notable works like Chaappa Kurishu and North 24 Kaatham.
  • He had been suffering from a serious illness and was receiving treatment, although the specifics of the illness are unknown.
  • The police are currently investigating the circumstances of his death.
“The actor had been suffering from a serious illness and was receiving treatment for it.”

The death of Dileep Shankar has raised questions about mental health and wellbeing in the entertainment industry, prompting a call for more awareness and support.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Internet reacts as Kashish Kapoor gets aggressive with Salman Khan, backtracks after actor responds. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Internet reacts as Kashish Kapoor gets aggressive with Salman Khan, backtracks after actor responds

Date: Dec 29, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

During the latest Weekend Ka War episode, Salman Khan confronted Kashish Kapoor about her accusations towards fellow contestant Avinash Mishra. The episode features a viral moment where Kashish's tone drastically shifts when Salman expresses discomfort.

  • Salman Khan addresses issues from the past week with contestants.
  • Kashish Kapoor changes her demeanor when confronted by Salman.
  • Kashish responds aggressively about her comments towards Avinash before backing down.
  • Fan reactions on social media have been varied, highlighting Salman's intimidating presence.
  • Salman also critiques Eisha Singh's behavior concerning Avinash Mishra.
“Koi angle nahi tha udhar (There was no angle with which I went ahead)!” - Kashish Kapoor

The episode aired at 10 PM on Colors TV and is available for streaming on Jio Cinema, continuing the drama and controversies surrounding the house.

item.title: When Rajesh Khanna predicted Akshay Kumar and Twinkle Khanna's son Aarav will be next superstar: 'He will - TOI Etimes
item.description:
When Rajesh Khanna predicted Akshay Kumar and Twinkle Khanna's son Aarav will be next superstar: 'He will carry the talent...'

Publication Date: Not specified

Source: Times of India

The late Bollywood superstar Rajesh Khanna believed that Aarav, the son of Akshay Kumar and Twinkle Khanna, would carry on the family legacy and become a celebrated figure in the film industry. His faith in Aarav's potential highlights a deep family connection to talent and dedication.

  • Rajesh Khanna once stated his belief that Aarav would become the next superstar.
  • Aarav is currently studying in London, having left home at 15 for independent living.
  • Akshay shared insights about Aarav's independence and values, including his preference for sustainability.
  • Twinkle Khanna has played a role in raising Aarav to be humble and grounded.
  • Akshay Kumar has several films in the pipeline and supports Aarav's decision to pursue his own interests.
“Aarav would inherit the family’s talent, dedication, and sacrifices.” - Rajesh Khanna

In conclusion, Rajesh Khanna's prediction illustrates the familial bonds in the film industry, as Akshay and Twinkle Khanna nurture their children's individual paths while holding on to their legacy.

item.title: Flipkart set to re-enter OTT space in 2025? - 123telugu
item.description:
Flipkart set to re-enter OTT space in 2025?

Published on Dec 29, 2024 by 123 Telugu

Flipkart, India’s e-commerce giant, is preparing to make a significant move back into the entertainment industry after discontinuing its previous OTT platform in 2019.

  • Flipkart had a brief foray into the OTT space with Flipkart Video.
  • The earlier venture was discontinued due to limited response from viewers.
  • Tollywood producer Sahu Garapati announced the news of Flipkart's plans for a comeback.
  • The company is aiming for a strong re-entry into the OTT market by 2025.
All eyes will be on whether Flipkart can successfully capture viewers' attention and make a lasting impact in the OTT space.

As Flipkart gears up for this new venture, its success will hinge on how it adapts to the competitive landscape of online entertainment.

item.title: Akshay Kumar wishes wife Twinkle Khanna on her 51st birthday, shares video of 'what she is really like'. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Akshay Kumar wishes wife Twinkle Khanna on her 51st birthday, shares video of 'what she is really like'

Date: Dec 29, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Akshay Kumar wished his wife, author Twinkle Khanna, in a unique way on her 51st birthday by sharing an edited video on Instagram that showcases various aspects of her personality.

  • The video features Twinkle relaxing at home and dancing in her living room.
  • Akshay's heartfelt note includes humorous and emotional sentiments about their relationship.
  • Twinkle Khanna is a successful author with several best-selling books.
  • The couple has been married since January 2001 and has two children.
“You’re not just a sport; you’re the whole game.” - Akshay Kumar

The celebration highlights the couple's loving relationship, with Akshay expressing admiration and joy for Twinkle on her special day.

item.title: Marco Hindi Box Office Collection (9 Days): Becomes Highest-Grossing Hindi-Dubbed Malayalam Film, Earns 50 Times More Than Day 1 On 2nd Saturday - Koimoi
item.description:
Marco Hindi Box Office Collection (9 Days): Becomes Highest-Grossing Hindi-Dubbed Malayalam Film, Earns 50 Times

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: Koimoi

Marco has gained significant attention across India, especially after a strong performance in Kerala, prompting increased showings in the Hindi belt.

  • It opened with 70 shows and increased to nearly 450 shows by day 9.
  • Despite mixed critical reviews, audience reaction has been very positive, driving ticket sales.
  • In its first 9 days, Marco earned a total of 1.03 crore net, becoming the highest-grossing Hindi-dubbed Malayalam film.
  • It registered its highest single-day collection on day 9, earning 0.50 crore.
“As compared to day 1 of 1 lakh, the Hindi-dubbed version of the Unni Mukundan starrer earned 50 times more yesterday.”

Marco's success indicates a growing acceptance and demand for regional films in Hindi-speaking markets.

item.title: Ravi Kishan recalls time father was going to kill him for playing role of Sita in 'Ramleela'; says 'Mom a - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Ravi Kishan recalls time father was going to kill him for playing role of Sita in 'Ramleela'; says 'Mom asked me to run away’

Publication Date: October 2023  Source: The Times of India

Ravi Kishan shares a personal anecdote from his past regarding his father's extreme reaction to his theater role.

  • Ravi Kishan portrayed the role of Sita in a play of Ramleela.
  • His father was furious and threatened to harm him for taking up the role.
  • Kishan's mother advised him to escape from the situation.
“Mom asked me to run away,” said Kishan, recounting the dramatic event.

This incident highlights the cultural pressures and family dynamics involved in pursuing acting roles in certain traditions.

item.title: Inside Salman Khan’s 59th birthday celebration at Jamnagar with the Ambanis. See photos and videos - The Indian Express
item.description:
Inside Salman Khan’s 59th birthday celebration at Jamnagar with the Ambanis. See photos and videos

Date: December 27, 2024 | Source: The Indian Express

The Ambani family hosted a grand birthday party for Bollywood superstar Salman Khan in Jamnagar as he turned 59.

  • Salman Khan cut a four-tier cake amidst family and friends, including the Ambanis.
  • Salman’s mother, siblings, and prominent Bollywood personalities attended the celebration.
  • Family members shared videos and photos of the celebration on social media.
  • Fireworks were part of the festivities, with the song “Jumme Ki Raat” from Salman’s film playing in the background.
“Salman Khan Ka sabse bada fan hai Anant Ambani! He is completely fond of him.” - Siddharth Mathur

Salman Khan's birthday celebration was filled with love and joy, showcasing strong family bonds and friendships.

item.title: ‘Arrogant’ Bollywood actor who pretends to be humble: Whom is boAt co-founder Aman Gupta talking about? | Today News - Mint
item.description:
Aman Gupta Calls Out 'Arrogant' Bollywood Actor Pretending to Be Humble

Publication Date: [Insert Date Here]

Source: Live Mint

Aman Gupta, co-founder of boAt Lifestyle, recently criticized a seemingly humble Bollywood actor for his arrogant behavior during their interactions, despite his favorable public persona.

During a YouTube conversation with Anupam Mittal, Gupta expressed that the actor, despite projecting a sweet image in the media, displayed significant arrogance in private dealings with the brand.

  • The actor was previously a brand ambassador for boAt Lifestyle.
  • Gupta described the conflict between the actor's public persona and private behavior.
  • Social media users have speculated on the actor's identity, mentioning names like Kartik Aryan and Ranveer Singh.
“I think, over time, the world starts to understand. I believe the Indian public is very smart. They figure out who is real, who is genuinely humble, who is actually arrogant.” - Aman Gupta

This conversation sparked discussions on social media, with users debating who the actor could be, reflecting on the nuances of celebrity humility versus arrogance.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection Day 24: Allu Arjun-starrer sees sharp jump, mints Rs 1141.35 crore - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Sees Sharp Jump

Date: December 12, 2024

Source: Indian Express

Allu Arjun’s Pushpa 2: The Rule continues its impressive box office run, achieving remarkable milestones in its fourth week.

  • The film saw a 42% increase in Saturday collections, earning Rs 12.5 crore.
  • Total domestic collection now stands at Rs 1141.35 crore.
  • The Hindi version has earned Rs 741.15 crore; Telugu version Rs 322.23 crore; Tamil version Rs 56.3 crore; Kannada and Malayalam versions Rs 7.57 crore and Rs 14.1 crore, respectively.
  • Worldwide collection of Pushpa 2 reached Rs 1719 crore, on track to surpass Baahubali 2's earnings.
“Pushpa 2 is poised to become the second-highest-grossing Indian film ever.”

The film is a tribute to Allu Arjun's star power and Sukumar’s compelling direction, featuring excellent performances from the cast.

However, the success has been marred by controversy, as Allu Arjun was involved in a court case related to a tragic stampede incident during a screening of the film.

item.title: Kerala Film Producers Association announce Rs 700 crore loss in 2024: ‘Only 26 out of 199 films were successful’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Kerala Film Producers Association announce Rs 700 crore loss in 2024: ‘Only 26 out of 199 films were successful’

Publication Date: December 2024
Source: Indian Express

The Kerala Film Producers’ Association reports a troubling year for Malayalam cinema, revealing that out of 199 films released in 2024, only 26 found success, resulting in a loss of Rs 700 crore.

  • Only Rs 300 crore recovered from a total investment of Rs 1000 crore.
  • The main successful films included Manjummel Boys, Aavesham, and Premalu with Rs 100 crore earnings.
  • The rising production costs and actor salaries are cited as major contributors to the financial losses.
  • The association emphasizes the need to attract audiences back to theaters, focusing on content over star power.
“Keeping production costs in check would fare well for the industry.”

Overall, the Producers’ Association hopes for improvements in 2025, urging for changes in how Malayalam cinema approaches production and audience engagement.

item.title: Shark Tank India's Aman Gupta spills tea on 'extremely egoistic' film star faking humility, internet wonders if it is... - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aman Gupta's Revelations About an 'Egoistic' Bollywood Star Spark Speculation

Publication Date: Dec 29, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Aman Gupta, co-founder of boAt and judge on Shark Tank India, recently discussed his experiences with an unnamed Bollywood star he described as 'extremely egoistic' during a podcast appearance. He highlighted the contrast between the star's public image and private demeanor.

  • Aman Gupta discussed an unnamed film star who portrayed humility but showed an opposite attitude in private.
  • Gupta mentioned that media often portrays this star as kind and humble, yet his experiences tell a different story.
  • Internet users began speculating the star's identity, with potential guesses including Diljit Dosanjh and Kartik Aaryan.
“We had this actor as our brand ambassador. He was an extremely egotistic man. In the news, I had always heard good things about him... However, Indians are pretty smart. One day or the other, they will get to know the reality.” - Aman Gupta

This revelation has sparked intrigue and speculation among fans, as the quest for the identity of the 'egoistic' actor continues to dominate discussions online.

item.description:
Buzz: Game Changer trailer will be released on this date

Published on: Dec 29, 2024 10:00 am IST

Game Changer, the much-anticipated film directed by Shankar and featuring Ram Charan, is set to release its trailer on January 4, 2025.

“Keeping fans on the edge of their seats.”

The buildup to the trailer's release is generating considerable excitement among fans, marking Game Changer as a focal point in upcoming Indian cinema.

item.title: Govinda’s daughter Tina Ahuja calls period cramps 'psychological' and advises girls to 'eat your ghee'; s - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Govinda’s daughter Tina Ahuja calls period cramps 'psychological' and sparks outrage online

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Tina Ahuja, daughter of actor Govinda, has stirred controversy by labeling period cramps as 'psychological' and suggesting that young women should 'eat your ghee' to alleviate discomfort. This statement has led to significant backlash on social media.

  • Tina Ahuja made comments regarding period cramps, calling them 'psychological.'
  • She advocated for dietary changes, specifically promoting the consumption of ghee.
  • The remarks have sparked outrage among women and health advocates online.
  • Many users on social media have criticized her perspective as dismissive of women's health issues.
“Period cramps are not just in your head; they can be severely debilitating.”

The controversy highlights ongoing discussions about women's health and the stigma surrounding menstrual pain. Public reactions reflect a broad sentiment regarding the need for more informed conversations on this topic.

item.title: Indian actor Urmila Kothare's car runs over metro workers in Mumbai, 1 killed - Gulf News
item.description:
Indian Actor Urmila Kothare's Car Runs Over Metro Workers in Mumbai, 1 Killed

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

A tragic accident involving Urmila Kothare's car resulted in the death of one Metro worker and left another seriously injured. The incident occurred near Poinsar Metro station in Kandivali, Mumbai, as Kothare was returning from a film shoot.

  • The car reportedly lost control while speeding, hitting the two laborers.
  • One worker died at the scene, while the other is hospitalized and receiving treatment.
  • Kothare suffered minor injuries, and the driver was severely injured.
  • A case has been registered against the driver, and an investigation is ongoing.
Police indicated that the airbags deployed in time, which likely saved Kothare from more severe injuries.

This incident highlights the dangers of reckless driving and the tragic consequences it can have on innocent lives.

item.title: Why did Suriya leave Vanangaan? Bala explains - 123telugu
item.description:
Why did Suriya leave Vanangaan? Bala explains

Published on Dec 29, 2024 | Source: 123Telugu

In a recent interview, filmmaker Bala clarified why Suriya exited the upcoming Tamil action drama Vanangaan, which is set to release on January 10, 2025.

  • The film was initially set with Suriya in the lead role, and some scenes were already filmed.
  • Logistical challenges arose from filming in real locations and tourist spots, leading to a mutual decision for Suriya to leave.
  • Bala assured that both he and Suriya remain on good terms and plan to collaborate in the future.
  • This clarification dispels rumors of creative differences being the cause of Suriya's departure.
  • Vanangaan stars Arun Vijay and is co-produced by Bala.
“There were no personal differences between us, and we remain on good terms,” said Bala.

This clarification helps fans understand the circumstances behind Suriya's exit from Vanangaan and reaffirm the positive working relationship between him and Bala.

item.title: Baby John box office collection Day 4: Varun Dhawan starrer crosses Rs 20 crore amid reports of cancelled - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Baby John box office collection Day 4: Varun Dhawan starrer crosses Rs 20 crore

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Varun Dhawan's latest film, Baby John, has reportedly crossed the Rs 20 crore mark in its box office collection by the end of Day 4, despite facing issues with cancelled screenings.

  • The film performed well at the box office, garnering over Rs 20 crore in four days.
  • There are reports of cancelled screenings affecting its overall performance.
  • Varun Dhawan continues to maintain a strong presence in the industry with this release.
“The movie has resonated with the audience, despite some screenings being cancelled.”

Overall, Baby John shows promising figures at the box office, indicating a positive reception from the audience, even amidst challenges like cancelled screenings.

item.description:
Will this speculation about Pushpa 2 come true?

Published on Dec 29, 2024 | Source: 123Telugu

Pushpa 2, directed by Sukumar and featuring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna, has grossed an impressive Rs. 1720 crore and continues to perform well at the box office even in its fourth week.

item.title: Shalin Bhanot Finds Love Again, Dating Bigg Boss 18's Eisha Singh? Know Here - News18
item.description:
Shalin Bhanot Finds Love Again, Dating Bigg Boss 18's Eisha Singh? Know Here

Date: December 29, 2024

Source: News18

In a recent episode of Bigg Boss 18, Eisha Singh addressed speculations about her relationship with Shalin Bhanot after host Salman Khan's probing questions.

  • Salman Khan hinted at Shalin's involvement during a playful exchange with Eisha.
  • Eisha clarified that they are merely good friends and not romantically involved.
  • Shalin was previously married to Dalljiet Kaur, and their divorce was marred by allegations of domestic violence.
  • Dalljiet recently remarried but is now separated again.
  • Despite their troubled past, Eisha values her friendship with Shalin.
“Shalin is only my best friend... but there’s nothing more to it,” Eisha stated.

This clarification comes amidst ongoing media speculation about their relationship post-Bigg Boss.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 24 Early Trends: Becomes First Hindi Film To Cross 750 Crores With 40% Jump On 4th Saturday - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 24 Early Trends: Becomes First Hindi Film To Cross 750 Crores With 40% Jump On 4

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: Koimoi

The Hindi-dubbed version of Allu Arjun’s Pushpa 2 continues to go crazy during the weekend. After enjoying a three-week historic run, the film picked up massively on the fourth Saturday. It once again entered double-digits and achieved another milestone at the Indian box office by crossing the 750 crore milestone, and is on track to be the first 800 crore net grosser.

  • Pushpa 2 (Hindi) achieved earnings of 10.50-11.50 crores on Day 24, a 40-53% increase from Day 23's earnings of 7.50 crores.
  • Total collection at the Indian box office now stands at 758.25-759.25 crores.
  • Pushpa 2 became the first Hindi film to cross the 650 crore, 700 crore, and now 750 crore milestones.
  • The film is expected to cross 770 crores soon as it continues to attract moviegoers.
“A particular film will need extraordinary buzz on the ground level, along with mass appealing content” - Koimoi

In summary, Pushpa 2 is setting unprecedented records in the Hindi film market, showcasing incredible earnings in its fourth weekend.

item.title: Girls Will Be Girls, All We Imagine as Light: How feminism, not Bollywood, drew global audiences to Indian cinema in 2024 - BBC.com
item.description:
Girls Will Be Girls: How Feminism, Not Bollywood, Drew Global Audiences to Indian Cinema in 2024

Date & Source: Published in May 2024 by BBC News

In 2024, Indian cinema experienced a significant shift as films directed by women gained global recognition, overshadowing Bollywood productions.

  • Payal Kapadia's All We Imagine As Light won the Grand Prix at the Cannes Film Festival and has received accolades from several prestigious organizations.
  • Girls Will Be Girls directed by Shuchi Talati won awards at the Sundance Film Festival.
  • These films explore universal themes like identity, gender, and resilience, marking a departure from mainstream narratives.
  • Kiran Rao's Laapataa Ladies was selected as India's official Oscar entry despite mixed box office performance.
“It's a culmination of both,” says film critic Shubhra Gupta.

The global impact of these films reveals a growing appetite for narratives that prioritize female experiences and challenge traditional storytelling in Indian cinema.
